00175     public class Set<T> :
00176         Collection<T>,
00177         ISet<T>
00178         where T : IEquatable<T>
00179     {
00183         public event EventHandler<SetChangedEventArgs<T>> OnSetChanged;
00184         
00185         ReadOnlySet<T> readonlyWrapper;
00186

00191         Set()
00192         {
00193         }

00199         Set(
00200             IEnumerable<T> initial
00201             )

00203             AddRange(initial);
00204         }

00210         Set(
00211             params T[] initial

00221         Set(
00222             IList<T> innerList

00224             : base(innerList)

00226         }
00227 
00231         public
00232         Set(
00233             int initialCount
00234             )
00235         {
00236             T defnull = default(T);
00237             for(int i = 0; i < initialCount; i++)
00238             {
00239                 Add(defnull);
00240             }
00241         }

00272         public ReadOnlySet<T> AsReadOnly
00273         {
00274             get
00275             {
00276                 if(readonlyWrapper == null)
00277                 {
00278                     readonlyWrapper = CreateNewReadOnlyWrapper(Items);
00279                 }
00280 
00281                 return readonlyWrapper;
00282             }
00283         }

00289         T[]
00290         ToArray()
00291         {
00292             T[] array = new T[Count];
00293             CopyTo(array, 0);
00294             return array;
00295         }

00321         public
00322         void
00323         AddRange(
00324             IEnumerable<T> range
00325             )
00326         {
00327             foreach(T item in range)
00328             {
00329                 Add(item);
00330             }
00331         }

00336         public
00337         void
00338         AddDistinct(
00339             T item
00340             )
00341         {
00342             if(!Contains(item))
00343             {
00344                 Add(item);
00345             }
00346         }
00347 
00351         public
00352         void
00353         AddRangeDistinct(
00354             IEnumerable<T> range
00355             )
00356         {
00357             foreach(T item in range)
00358             {
00359                 if(!Contains(item))
00360                 {
00361                     Add(item);
00362                 }
00363             }
00364         }
00365 
00369         public
00370         void
00371         RemoveDuplicates()
00372         {
00373             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
00374             for(int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00375             {
00376                 T item = base[i];
00377                 if(table.ContainsKey(item))
00378                 {
00379                     RemoveAt(i);
00380                 }
00381                 else
00382                 {
00383                     table.Add(item, null);
00384                 }
00385             }
00386         }
00387 
00391         public
00392         void
00393         ReplaceRange(
00394             IEnumerable<T> range
00395             )
00396         {
00397             int i = 0;
00398             foreach(T item in range)
00399             {
00400                 base[i++] = item;
00401             }
00402         }
00403 
00407         protected override
00408         void
00409         InsertItem(
00410             int index,
00411             T item
00412             )
00413         {
00414             EventHandler<SetChangedEventArgs<T>> handler = OnSetChanged;
00415             if(handler == null)
00416             {
00417                 base.InsertItem(index, item);
00418             }
00419             else
00420             {
00421                 base.InsertItem(index, item);
00422                 handler(this, SetChangedEventArgs<T>.Added(item, index));
00423                 for(int i = index + 1; i < Count; i++)
00424                 {
00425                     handler(this, SetChangedEventArgs<T>.Moved(base[i], i - 1, i));
00426                 }
00427             }
00428         }
00429 
00433         protected override
00434         void
00435         RemoveItem(
00436             int index
00437             )
00438         {
00439             EventHandler<SetChangedEventArgs<T>> handler = OnSetChanged;
00440             if(handler == null)
00441             {
00442                 base.RemoveItem(index);
00443             }
00444             else
00445             {
00446                 handler(this, SetChangedEventArgs<T>.Removed(base[index], index));
00447                 base.RemoveItem(index);
00448                 for(int i = index; i < Count; i++)
00449                 {
00450                     handler(this, SetChangedEventArgs<T>.Moved(base[i], i + 1, i));
00451                 }
00452             }
00453         }
00454 
00458         protected override
00459         void
00460         SetItem(
00461             int index,
00462             T item
00463             )
00464         {
00465             EventHandler<SetChangedEventArgs<T>> handler = OnSetChanged;
00466             if(handler == null)
00467             {
00468                 base.SetItem(index, item);
00469             }
00470             else
00471             {
00472                 handler(this, SetChangedEventArgs<T>.Removed(base[index], index));
00473                 base.SetItem(index, item);
00474                 handler(this, SetChangedEventArgs<T>.Added(item, index));
00475             }
00476         }

00485         public
00486         bool
00487         IsSubset(
00488             IEnumerable<T> c
00489             )
00490         {
00491             foreach(T item in c)
00492             {
00493                 if(!Contains(item))
00494                 {
00495                     return false;
00496                 }
00497             }
00498 
00499             return true;
00500         }
00501 
00505         public
00506         bool
00507         IsSuperset(
00508             IEnumerable<T> c
00509             )
00510         {
00511             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
00512 
00513             foreach(T item in c)
00514             {
00515                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00516                 {
00517                     table.Add(item, null);
00518                 }
00519             }
00520 
00521             foreach(T item in this)
00522             {
00523                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00524                 {
00525                     return false;
00526                 }
00527             }
00528 
00529             return true;
00530         }
00531 
00536         public
00537         bool
00538         HasEqualElements(
00539             IEnumerable<T> c
00540             )
00541         {
00542             // TODO: quite inelegant, find better algorithm.
00543 
00544             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
00545 
00546             foreach(T item in c)
00547             {
00548                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00549                 {
00550                     table.Add(item, null);
00551                     if(!Contains(item))
00552                     {
00553                         return false;
00554                     }
00555                 }
00556             }
00557 
00558             foreach(T item in this)
00559             {
00560                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00561                 {
00562                     return false;
00563                 }
00564             }
00565 
00566             return true;
00567         }

00603         public static
00604         Set<T>
00605         Concatenate(
00606             IEnumerable<T> c1,
00607             IEnumerable<T> c2
00608             )
00609         {
00610             Set<T> s = new Set<T>(c1);
00611             s.AddRange(c2);
00612             return s;
00613         }

00635         public
00636         void
00637         UnionInplace(
00638             IEnumerable<T> c
00639             )
00640         {
00641             RemoveDuplicates();
00642             AddRangeDistinct(c);
00643         }
00644 
00650         public static
00651         Set<T>
00652         Union(
00653             IEnumerable<T> c1,
00654             IEnumerable<T> c2
00655             )
00656         {
00657             Set<T> s = new Set<T>();
00658             s.AddRangeDistinct(c1);
00659             s.AddRangeDistinct(c2);
00660             return s;
00661         }

00679 
00683         public
00684         void
00685         IntersectInplace(
00686             IEnumerable<T> c
00687             )
00688         {
00689             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
00690 
00691             foreach(T item in c)
00692             {
00693                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00694                 {
00695                     table.Add(item, null);
00696                 }
00697             }
00698 
00699             for(int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00700             {
00701                 if(!table.ContainsKey(base[i]))
00702                 {
00703                     RemoveAt(i);
00704                 }
00705             }
00706         }
00707 
00713         public static
00714         Set<T>
00715         Intersect(
00716             IEnumerable<T> c1,
00717             IEnumerable<T> c2
00718             )
00719         {
00720             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
00721             foreach(T item in c1)
00722             {
00723                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00724                 {
00725                     table.Add(item, null);
00726                 }
00727             }
00728 
00729             Set<T> s = new Set<T>();
00730             foreach(T item in c2)
00731             {
00732                 if(table.ContainsKey(item) && !s.Contains(item))
00733                 {
00734                     s.Add(item);
00735                 }
00736             }
00737 
00738             return s;
00739         }

00772                 {
00773                     table.Add(item, null);
00774                 }

00791         public static
00792         Set<T>
00793         Subtract(
00794             IEnumerable<T> c1,
00795             IEnumerable<T> c2
00796             )
00797         {
00798             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
00799             foreach(T item in c2)
00800             {
00801                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00802                 {
00803                     table.Add(item, null);
00804                 }
00805             }
00806 
00807             Set<T> s = new Set<T>();
00808             foreach(T item in c1)
00809             {
00810                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
00811                 {
00812                     s.Add(item);
00813                 }
00814             }
00815 
00816             return s;
00817         }

00826         public
00827         bool
00828         Exists(
00829             Predicate<T> match
00830             )
00831         {
00832             return (FindIndex(match) != -1);
00833         }
00834 
00838         public
00839         bool
00840         Exists(
00841             Predicate<T> match,
00842             out T foundItem
00843             )
00844         {
00845             int idx = FindIndex(match);
00846             if(idx == -1)
00847             {
00848                 foundItem = default(T);
00849                 return false;
00850             }
00851             else
00852             {
00853                 foundItem = base[idx];
00854                 return true;
00855             }
00856         }
00857 
00861         public
00862         bool
00863         TrueForAll(
00864             Predicate<T> match
00865             )
00866         {
00867             if(match == null)
00868             {
00869                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
00870             }
00871 
00872             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
00873             {
00874                 if(!match(base[i]))
00875                 {
00876                     return false;
00877                 }
00878             }
00879 
00880             return true;
00881         }
00882 
00886         public
00887         void
00888         ForEach(
00889             Action<T> action
00890             )
00891         {
00892             if(action == null)
00893             {
00894                 throw new ArgumentNullException("action");
00895             }
00896 
00897             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
00898             {
00899                 action(base[i]);
00900             }
00901         }
00902 
00903         #region Find Lambdas
00904 
00908         public
00909         T
00910         Find(
00911             Predicate<T> match
00912             )
00913         {
00914             if(match == null)
00915             {
00916                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
00917             }
00918 
00919             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
00920             {
00921                 if(match(base[i]))
00922                 {
00923                     return base[i];
00924                 }
00925             }
00926 
00927             return default(T);
00928         }
00929 
00933         public
00934         int
00935         FindIndex(
00936             Predicate<T> match
00937             )
00938         {
00939             return FindIndex(0, Count, match);
00940         }
00941 
00945         public
00946         int
00947         FindIndex(
00948             int startIndex,
00949             Predicate<T> match
00950             )
00951         {
00952             return FindIndex(startIndex, Count - startIndex, match);
00953         }
00954 
00958         public
00959         int
00960         FindIndex(
00961             int startIndex,
00962             int count,
00963             Predicate<T> match
00964             )
00965         {
00966             if(startIndex > Count)
00967             {
00968                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startIndex");
00969             }
00970 
00971             if((count < 0) || (startIndex > (Count - count)))
00972             {
00973                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");
00974             }
00975 
00976             if(match == null)
00977             {
00978                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
00979             }
00980 
00981             int afterLast = startIndex + count;
00982             for(int i = startIndex; i < afterLast; i++)
00983             {
00984                 if(match(base[i]))
00985                 {
00986                     return i;
00987                 }
00988             }
00989 
00990             return -1;
00991         }
00992 
00996         public
00997         T
00998         FindLast(
00999             Predicate<T> match
01000             )
01001         {
01002             if(match == null)
01003             {
01004                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01005             }
01006 
01007             for(int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
01008             {
01009                 if(match(base[i]))
01010                 {
01011                     return base[i];
01012                 }
01013             }
01014 
01015             return default(T);
01016         }
01017 
01021         public
01022         int
01023         FindLastIndex(
01024             Predicate<T> match
01025             )
01026         {
01027             return FindLastIndex(Count - 1, Count, match);
01028         }
01029 
01033         public
01034         int
01035         FindLastIndex(
01036             int startIndex,
01037             Predicate<T> match
01038             )
01039         {
01040             return FindLastIndex(startIndex, startIndex + 1, match);
01041         }
01042 
01046         public
01047         int
01048         FindLastIndex(
01049             int startIndex,
01050             int count,
01051             Predicate<T> match
01052             )
01053         {
01054             if(startIndex >= Count)
01055             {
01056                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startIndex");
01057             }
01058 
01059             if((count < 0) || (((startIndex - count) + 1) < 0))
01060             {
01061                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");
01062             }
01063 
01064             if(match == null)
01065             {
01066                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01067             }
01068 
01069             int afterLast = startIndex - count;
01070             for(int i = startIndex; i > afterLast; i--)
01071             {
01072                 if(match(base[i]))
01073                 {
01074                     return i;
01075                 }
01076             }
01077 
01078             return -1;
01079         }
01080 
01084         public
01085         int
01086         LastIndexOf(
01087             T item
01088             )
01089         {
01090             for(int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
01091             {
01092                 if(item.Equals(base[i]))
01093                 {
01094                     return i;
01095                 }
01096             }
01097 
01098             return -1;
01099         }
01100 
01104         public
01105         Set<T>
01106         FindAll(
01107             Predicate<T> match
01108             )
01109         {
01110             if(match == null)
01111             {
01112                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01113             }
01114 
01115             Set<T> found = CreateNewSet();
01116             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
01117             {
01118                 if(match(base[i]))
01119                 {
01120                     found.Add(base[i]);
01121                 }
01122             }
01123 
01124             return found;
01125         }
01126 
01127         #endregion
01128 
01133         public
01134         int
01135         RemoveAll(
01136             Predicate<T> match
01137             )
01138         {
01139             int cnt = 0;
01140             for(int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
01141             {
01142                 if(match(base[i]))
01143                 {
01144                     cnt++;
01145                     RemoveAt(i);
01146                 }
01147             }
01148 
01149             return cnt;
01150         }
01151 
01152         #endregion
01153 
01154         #region Converter
01155 
01159         public
01160         Set<TOutput>
01161         ConvertAll<TOutput>(
01162             Converter<T, TOutput> convert
01163             ) where TOutput : IEquatable<TOutput>
01164         {
01165             Set<TOutput> ret = new Set<TOutput>();
01166 
01167             foreach(T item in this)
01168             {
01169                 ret.Add(convert(item));
01170             }
01171 
01172             return ret;
01173         }
01174 
01175         #endregion
01176 
01177         #region Sorting
01178 
01182         public
01183         void
01184         Sort(
01185             IComparer<T> comparer
01186             )
01187         {
01188             Sort(0, Count, comparer);
01189         }
01190 
01194         public
01195         void
01196         Sort(
01197             int index,
01198             int count,
01199             IComparer<T> comparer
01200             )
01201         {
01202             IList<T> items = Items;
01203 
01204             List<T> list = items as List<T>;
01205             if(list != null)
01206             {
01207                 list.Sort(index, count, comparer);
01208                 return;
01209             }
01210 
01211             T[] array = items as T[];
01212             if(array != null)
01213             {
01214                 Array.Sort<T>(array, index, count, comparer);
01215                 return;
01216             }
01217 
01218             throw new NotSupportedException();
01219         }
01220 
01221         #endregion
01222     }

01227     public class ReadOnlySet<T> : 
01228         ReadOnlyCollection<T>,
01229         ISet<T>
01230         where T : IEquatable<T>
01231     {
01235         public
01236         ReadOnlySet(
01237             IList<T> list
01238             ) : base(list)
01239         {
01240         }
01241 
01245         public
01246         T[]
01247         ToArray()
01248         {
01249             T[] array = new T[Count];
01250             CopyTo(array, 0);
01251             return array;
01252         }
01253 
01257         protected virtual
01258         Set<T>
01259         CreateNewSet()
01260         {
01261             return new Set<T>();
01262         }
01263 
01264         #region Subsets
01265 
01269         public
01270         bool
01271         IsSubset(
01272             IEnumerable<T> c
01273             )
01274         {
01275             foreach(T item in c)
01276             {
01277                 if(!Contains(item))
01278                 {
01279                     return false;
01280                 }
01281             }
01282 
01283             return true;
01284         }
01285 
01289         public
01290         bool
01291         IsSuperset(
01292             IEnumerable<T> c
01293             )
01294         {
01295             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
01296 
01297             foreach(T item in c)
01298             {
01299                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
01300                 {
01301                     table.Add(item, null);
01302                 }
01303             }
01304 
01305             foreach(T item in this)
01306             {
01307                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
01308                 {
01309                     return false;
01310                 }
01311             }
01312 
01313             return true;
01314         }
01315 
01320         public
01321         bool
01322         HasEqualElements(
01323             IEnumerable<T> c
01324             )
01325         {
01326             // TODO: quite inelegant, find better algorithm.
01327 
01328             Dictionary<T, object> table = new Dictionary<T, object>();
01329             foreach(T item in c)
01330             {
01331                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
01332                 {
01333                     table.Add(item, null);
01334                     if(!Contains(item))
01335                     {
01336                         return false;
01337                     }
01338                 }
01339             }
01340 
01341             foreach(T item in this)
01342             {
01343                 if(!table.ContainsKey(item))
01344                 {
01345                     return false;
01346                 }
01347             }
01348 
01349             return true;
01350         }

01359         public
01360         bool
01361         Exists(
01362             Predicate<T> match
01363             )
01364         {
01365             return (FindIndex(match) != -1);
01366         }
01367 
01371         public
01372         bool
01373         Exists(
01374             Predicate<T> match,
01375             out T foundItem
01376             )
01377         {
01378             int idx = FindIndex(match);
01379             if(idx == -1)
01380             {
01381                 foundItem = default(T);
01382                 return false;
01383             }
01384             else
01385             {
01386                 foundItem = base[idx];
01387                 return true;
01388             }
01389         }
01390 
01394         public
01395         bool
01396         TrueForAll(
01397             Predicate<T> match
01398             )
01399         {
01400             if(match == null)
01401             {
01402                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01403             }
01404 
01405             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
01406             {
01407                 if(!match(base[i]))
01408                 {
01409                     return false;
01410                 }
01411             }
01412 
01413             return true;
01414         }
01415 
01419         public
01420         void
01421         ForEach(
01422             Action<T> action
01423             )
01424         {
01425             if(action == null)
01426             {
01427                 throw new ArgumentNullException("action");
01428             }
01429 
01430             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
01431             {
01432                 action(base[i]);
01433             }
01434         }

01437 
01441         public
01442         T
01443         Find(
01444             Predicate<T> match
01445             )
01446         {
01447             if(match == null)
01448             {
01449                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01450             }
01451 
01452             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
01453             {
01454                 if(match(base[i]))
01455                 {
01456                     return base[i];
01457                 }
01458             }
01459 
01460             return default(T);
01461         }
01462 
01466         public
01467         int
01468         FindIndex(
01469             Predicate<T> match
01470             )
01471         {
01472             return FindIndex(0, Count, match);
01473         }
01474 
01478         public
01479         int
01480         FindIndex(
01481             int startIndex,
01482             Predicate<T> match
01483             )
01484         {
01485             return FindIndex(startIndex, Count - startIndex, match);
01486         }
01487 
01491         public
01492         int
01493         FindIndex(
01494             int startIndex,
01495             int count,
01496             Predicate<T> match
01497             )
01498         {
01499             if(startIndex > Count)
01500             {
01501                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startIndex");
01502             }
01503 
01504             if((count < 0) || (startIndex > (Count - count)))
01505             {
01506                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");
01507             }
01508 
01509             if(match == null)
01510             {
01511                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01512             }
01513 
01514             int afterLast = startIndex + count;
01515             for(int i = startIndex; i < afterLast; i++)
01516             {
01517                 if(match(base[i]))
01518                 {
01519                     return i;
01520                 }
01521             }
01522 
01523             return -1;
01524         }
01525 
01529         public
01530         T
01531         FindLast(
01532             Predicate<T> match
01533             )
01534         {
01535             if(match == null)
01536             {
01537                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01538             }
01539 
01540             for(int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
01541             {
01542                 if(match(base[i]))
01543                 {
01544                     return base[i];
01545                 }
01546             }
01547 
01548             return default(T);
01549         }
01550 
01554         public
01555         int
01556         FindLastIndex(
01557             Predicate<T> match
01558             )
01559         {
01560             return FindLastIndex(Count - 1, Count, match);
01561         }
01562 
01566         public
01567         int
01568         FindLastIndex(
01569             int startIndex,
01570             Predicate<T> match
01571             )
01572         {
01573             return FindLastIndex(startIndex, startIndex + 1, match);
01574         }
01575 
01579         public
01580         int
01581         FindLastIndex(
01582             int startIndex,
01583             int count,
01584             Predicate<T> match
01585             )
01586         {
01587             if(startIndex >= Count)
01588             {
01589                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startIndex");
01590             }
01591 
01592             if((count < 0) || (((startIndex - count) + 1) < 0))
01593             {
01594                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");
01595             }
01596 
01597             if(match == null)
01598             {
01599                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01600             }
01601 
01602             int afterLast = startIndex - count;
01603             for(int i = startIndex; i > afterLast; i--)
01604             {
01605                 if(match(base[i]))
01606                 {
01607                     return i;
01608                 }
01609             }
01610 
01611             return -1;
01612         }
01613 
01617         public
01618         int
01619         LastIndexOf(
01620             T item
01621             )
01622         {
01623             for(int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
01624             {
01625                 if(item.Equals(base[i]))
01626                 {
01627                     return i;
01628                 }
01629             }
01630 
01631             return -1;
01632         }
01633 
01637         public
01638         Set<T>
01639         FindAll(
01640             Predicate<T> match
01641             )
01642         {
01643             if(match == null)
01644             {
01645                 throw new ArgumentNullException("match");
01646             }
01647 
01648             Set<T> found = CreateNewSet();
01649             for(int i = 0; i < Count; i++)
01650             {
01651                 if(match(base[i]))
01652                 {
01653                     found.Add(base[i]);
01654                 }
01655             }
01656 
01657             return found;
01658         }

01773         #region Converter
01774 
01778         public
01779         Set<TOutput>
01780         ConvertAll<TOutput>(
01781             Converter<T, TOutput> convert
01782             ) where TOutput : IEquatable<TOutput>
01783         {
01784             Set<TOutput> ret = new Set<TOutput>();
01785 
01786             foreach(T item in this)
01787             {
01788                 ret.Add(convert(item));
01789             }
01790 
01791             return ret;
01792         }

01796 
01800     public enum SetElementOperation
01801     {
01805         Added,
01806 
01810         Removed,
01811 
01815         Moved
01816     }
01817 
01822     public class SetChangedEventArgs<T> :
01823         EventArgs
01824     {
01825         SetElementOperation op;
01826         T element;
01827         int indexBefore;
01828         int indexAfter;
01829 
01830         SetChangedEventArgs(
01831             SetElementOperation op,
01832             T element,
01833             int indexBefore,
01834             int indexAfter
01835             )
01836         {
01837             this.op = op;
01838             this.element = element;
01839             this.indexBefore = indexBefore;
01840             this.indexAfter = indexAfter;
01841         }
01842 
01849         public static
01850         SetChangedEventArgs<T>
01851         Moved(
01852             T element,
01853             int indexBefore,
01854             int indexAfter
01855             )
01856         {
01857             return new SetChangedEventArgs<T>(SetElementOperation.Moved, element, indexBefore, indexAfter);
01858         }
01859 
01865         public static
01866         SetChangedEventArgs<T>
01867         Added(
01868             T element,
01869             int index
01870             )
01871         {
01872             return new SetChangedEventArgs<T>(SetElementOperation.Added, element, -1, index);
01873         }
01874 
01880         public static
01881         SetChangedEventArgs<T>
01882         Removed(
01883             T element,
01884             int index
01885             )
01886         {
01887             return new SetChangedEventArgs<T>(SetElementOperation.Removed, element, index, -1);
01888         }
01889 
01893         public T Element
01894         {
01895             get { return element; }
01896         }
01897 
01901         public SetElementOperation Operation
01902         {
01903             get { return op; }
01904         }
01905 
01909         public bool ElementAdded
01910         {
01911             get { return op == SetElementOperation.Added; }
01912         }
01913 
01917         public bool ElementRemoved
01918         {
01919             get { return op == SetElementOperation.Removed; }
01920         }
01921 
01925         public bool ElementMoved
01926         {
01927             get { return op == SetElementOperation.Moved; }
01928         }
01929 
01933         public int IndexBefore
01934         {
01935             get { return indexBefore; }
01936         }
01937 
01941         public int IndexAfter
01942         {
01943             get { return indexAfter; }
01944         }
01945     }
